title: Google\Cloud\Debugger\V2\SourceLocation
name: SourceLocation
description:
Represents a location in the source code.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.clouddebugger.v2.SourceLocation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.path
params.description: Path to the source file within the source context of the target binary.

params.name: data.line
params.description: Line inside the file. The first line in the file has the value 1.

params.name: data.column
params.description: Column within a line. The first column in a line as the value 1. Agents that do not support setting breakpoints on specific columns ignore this field.

methods.name: getPath
methods.description:
Path to the source file within the source context of the target binary.
